msg:
# Show the difference between two files without creating temporary files
diff <(sort file1) <(sort file2)

# show the difference between two directories
diff -r DIRECTORY1 DIRECTORY2

# Show the difference between two directories, ignoring .DS_Store files
diff -rx .DS_Store DIR1 DIR2

# diff remote files over SSH

ssh user@remote_host "cat remote_file.txt" | diff - local_file.txt
